"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.To be able to work normally, this app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information: "

string.name: declaration_main_content2
string.Data: "If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to sign out or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using FM Radio."

string.name: declaration_main_content2_unloadable
string.Data: "If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using FM Radio."

resources.string: Welcome to FM Radio! You can use this app to listen to the programs provided by the local and online radio stations.

您尚未完成免密支付签约，是否继续？
单笔扣款限额%1$.2f元，每日累计限额%2$.2f元
单笔金额高于%1$.2f元或者当日累计支付满%2$.2f元时，需要你输入支付密码确认才会扣款
扣款渠道：支付宝余额、信用卡、储蓄卡、余额宝、花呗等
扣款顺序：请查看“支付宝—我的—头像—设置—支付设置—默认付款方式”
如需关闭免密支付，请使用已签约免密的支付宝账号登录支付宝客户端进行解约，操作步骤“支付宝—我的—设置—支付设置—免密支付/自动扣款”
